Message: Hey babe, I heard about a really cool party on Friday night. Do you want to come?
What sort of party?
Its a party at my mates house. Its going to be epic. I would like to take you, and show you off.
Ok. Sounds fun.
Hey Lottie, Jack told me you're coming to the party on Friday. Can't wait to meet you. Jack's told me so much about you. ;)
Hi Mike, yeah I'm looking forward to it. What should I expect?
Just a bunch of us hanging out, having some drinks, playing some games. It's going to be a lot of fun. You're going to love it.
Sounds great! See you there.
Hey babe, Mike really wants to get to know you better. He thinks you sound amazing.
Aw that's sweet. I'm excited to meet him too.
He wants to know if you'll send him a pic. He's really curious about what you look like.
I don't know... I feel a bit weird about that.
Come on babe, it's just a pic. You can trust Mike, he's my best mate. It's not like he's asking for anything dirty.
Ok, fine. I'll send him one.
Thanks for the pic Lottie. You look gorgeous. I can see why Jack likes you so much.
Thanks Mike. See you at the party.
I can't wait for the party tomorrow. It's going to be so much fun with you there.
Me neither. I'm really excited.
Hey Lottie, do you want to play a game of 'I have never' at the party? It's a great way to get to know people. ;)
Haha, maybe. Depends on what the dares are!
Don't worry, it's all just a bit of fun. Jack's told me you're up for a laugh, so I think you'll enjoy it.
Almost time for the party babe. Can't wait to see you. Wear something sexy ;)
I'll see what I can do. See you soon!
Looking forward to seeing you tonight Lottie. Let's have some fun. ;)
Last night was amazing. You looked so hot. I wish we could have stayed longer.
It was fun. I'm glad I came. Mike was really nice.
He really likes you. He thought you were really sexy.
He did? That's a bit weird, isn't it?
No, it's just a compliment, babe. He just appreciates a beautiful girl when he sees one.
Hey Lottie, it was great to meet you last night. You're even more gorgeous in person. Jack's a lucky guy.
Thanks Mike. It was nice to meet you too.
I was wondering, do you want to hang out with me and Jack sometime? Just the three of us?
I don't know... sounds a bit weird.
Come on, it'll be fun. We can just chill, watch a movie or something. No pressure.
You should come babe. It'll be a laugh. I trust Mike completely, you know that.
Ok, fine. But only if you promise it's not going to be weird.
It won't be, I promise. We'll just have some fun, the three of us.
Hey Lottie, Jack's told me about the pics you sent him. You sound like you're really into him. That's so hot.
I don't know what you mean... those pics were private.
Relax, I'm just saying, it's hot that you're so into him. I wish I had a girl like you.
I'm not sure what to say...
You don't have to say anything. I just wanted you to know that I think you're really special. I hope we can all hang out more.
Mike really likes you babe. He thinks you're really special, just like I do.
I'm not sure how I feel about this... it's a bit strange.
Don't worry about it babe. It's all just a bit of fun. We both really care about you. Let's just see how things go.
Hey Lottie, do you want to come round to mine tomorrow night? Jack's coming too. We can just chill, watch a movie.
I don't know... I'll have to think about it.
You should come babe. It'll be fun, just the three of us. We can have a laugh, like we did at the party.
Ok, fine. But promise me it's not going to be weird.
It won't be, I promise. We'll just have some fun, like we always do.
Hey Lottie, looking forward to tonight. Do you want to bring anything to drink?
I can't bring anything, my mum will notice. I'll just see you there.
Cool, no worries. We'll have everything we need here. Can't wait to see you.
See you soon babe. It's going to be a great night. Love you xxx
Love you too. See you soon.
I don't feel good about this. Mike keeps trying to touch me.
It's ok babe, he's just having a bit of fun. He doesn't mean anything by it.
I want to go home. I don't like this.
Come on babe, don't be like that. We're just having a laugh. Let's not ruin the night.
Hey, where'd you go? Come back and join the fun. We're just messing around.
I don't feel well. I think I should go home.
Don't go yet. The night's still young. Let's have some more fun. I promise I'll behave.
Yeah babe, stay a bit longer. We promise we'll behave. We just want to have some fun with you.
